sentences.en: An admonition will be given for a technical foul.
sentences.cn: 每出现一次技术犯规,劝告一次.

sentences.en: And now this admonition is for you, O priests.
sentences.cn: 众祭司阿,这诫命是传给你们的.

sentences.en: But thee We only sent to give glad tidings and admonition.
sentences.cn: 我只派遣你为报喜者和警告者.

sentences.en: Eisenhower's parting admonition in 1956 was " Give'em heaven. "
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔1956年的临别赠言是: “ 给他们留点情面. ”

sentences.en: EPH 6:4 bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
sentences.cn: 弗:6:4只要照着主的教训和警戒,养育他们.

sentences.en: From beginning to end, the admonition Fear insistent.
sentences.cn: 该书从头到尾, 都不停的告诫人们“不要害怕”.

sentences.en: Isabel listened with extreme respect to this admonition.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔非常郑重地听取了这个期望.

sentences.en: It was an admonition then; it is an urgent need today.
sentences.cn: 这番话在当时是一种忠告, 在今天则是迫切的需要.

sentences.en: Medieval European classic morality play Everyman has a strong philosophy, admonition, purity.
sentences.cn: 欧洲中世纪经典道德剧《世人》具有很强的哲理性 、 劝诫性 、 纯净性.

sentences.en: She ignored the admonitions of her mother.
The students take the admonition from their teacher.
sentences.cn: 学生们接受老师的劝告.

sentences.en: The youth rejected admonition and held to his demand.
sentences.cn: 青年不听劝告,仍然坚持自己的要求.

sentences.en: This an admonition: Whosoever will, let him take a ( straight ) Path to his Lord.
sentences.cn: 这确是教诲, 谁愿意觉悟,谁可以选择一条 通达 他的主的道路.

sentences.en: Those permanents come back if Admonition Angel leaves the battlefield.
sentences.cn: 当AdmonitionAngel离场时,被其放逐的永久物回场.

sentences.en: With this parting admonition, he left Clyde to his thoughts.
sentences.cn: 这样临行前劝告了一番, 他就走了,留下克莱德自己想心事.

trans.tran_cn: 告诫，劝告，轻责，（温和的）责备
trans.tran_en: a warning or expression of disapproval about someone’s behaviour
